    • 构造器详细资料

      • User

        public User(java.lang.String username)
        Empty constructor. You could use
        另请参阅:
        setName(String), setPassword(String), setGuest(boolean), setCurrentPosition(Position), before login

      • User

        public User(java.lang.String userName,
            java.lang.String password,
            boolean guest)
        参数:
        userName - User Name
        password - Password (Can be null)
        guest - if the account is a guest account,the server will delete user information after logout

    • 方法详细资料

      • setId

        public void setId(java.lang.String id)
        Do not change it,which is used to find other clients.
        参数:
        id -

      • setName

        public void setName(java.lang.String name)
        You cannot change it dynamically after login,maybe will support later.
        参数:
        name - User Name To Set.

      • setPassword

        public void setPassword(java.lang.String password)
        Set user's password
        参数:
        password -

      • setCurrentPosition

        public void setCurrentPosition(Position currentPosition)
        Set user's position. Only works before login. After user logged in, You should use Client.update(Position) instead.
        参数:
        currentPosition - where is this guy now.
        另请参阅:
        Position

      • setNearByDistance

        public void setNearByDistance(float nearByDistance)
        How far the "Near By" is. Length Unit:meter default value:1000m
        参数:
        nearByDistance -

      • setGuest

        public void setGuest(boolean guest)
        If the account is a guest account,the server will delete user information after logout
        参数:
        guest -

      • getId

        public java.lang.String getId()
        返回:
        id used to identify the Client link to this User.

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        返回:
        User Name

      • getPassword

        public java.lang.String getPassword()
        The account information you get from the server will not tell you this.
        返回:
        User Password

      • getCurrentPosition

        public Position getCurrentPosition()
        返回:
        where is this guy now.
